ygData.subject: 15th level to 19th level
ygData.msgSnippet: What I want to know is....where should I be fighting in order to go from 15th level to 19th level quickly? I ve been in Highpass Hold recently with a group of
ygData.messageBody:
What I want to know is....where should I be fighting in order to go from
15th level to 19th level quickly? I've been in Highpass Hold recently
with a group of 4 others, but the xp for gnolls wasn't that good, and
the orcs were camped heavily. I'm in Freeport now, and need a good place
to go (preferably with a group, as my Smite spell is difficult to cast
while being attacked!)

thanks,
Flidias Anfalas
karana server
-----Original Message-----
From: bigsexxyryan@... [mailto:bigsexxyryan@...]
Sent: Monday, May 31, 1999 12:21 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Hey


From: bigsexxyryan@...

Hail all im a 28th Level cleric on the Mith Marr server. Im glad there
is a list up for all of us clerics to get together and haggle about
stuff. I would like to respond about the shaman poison spell is better
then clerics undead, im afraid to say but shaman spells are no wear
close. Beleive me i have a shaman. Right now im doing 148 damage a pop
costing me only 90 mana and we all know how fast undead spells recover
:)

The only other class which are almost equal with us in damage to mana
ratio are wizards and thats only at higher levels. Don't think that the
cleric class is just a band aid class, i get right up there in the
fights clobbering away. I might only be doing 17 points a hit but when
your fighting a monster a Mob and do about 200 damage in 40 secs or so
it adds up. 29th level is the golden level. We get new attack spell
Wrath which can do up to 198 +2 per level. My undead spells doing a
whopping 150 damage. Get new spell called Guard which increases AC, get
Restore spell and New Divine Aura spell which not only lasts longer it
will rapidly restore hp and stamina.

Well fellow cleric i must be off to fight for justice and honor.

Enursin, High Cleric BTG
